name: ChaosBlacksmith
description:
You play as a blacksmith at work filling up orders and collecting score so try and beat your high score!

-As time progress orders will begin to fill up even faster!

You will have to  fulfill them before your time runs out.

-shop system helps you get the ores that you need for a few of your earned gold coins

*Tip

-Buying from the store not only gives you what you need but also refresh the ores bar and maybe give you more good ores if you'r lucky.
